description:
Follow the travails of intrepid
explorer, Percy Pack, in Jewel Quest:
The Sleepless Star. On a quest for a
jewel called the Sleepless Star, Pack
discovers that the jewel has been
stolen from a Native American village
by an unscrupulous jewel collector!
Along with Percy and a beautiful
Algonquin named Yellow Feather,
travel to exotic locations on two
continents and overcome dangers at
every turn, in an effort to recover the
jewel.
name:
Jewel Quest 5 -
The Sleepless Star
